lead_paragraph: Because of an editing error, an article in some copies on Sunday about the Mets’ 10-8 extra-innings loss to the Cardinals misstated the surname of the Mets’ starting pitcher in the game. He is Brandon Knight, not Wright.
snippet: Because of an editing error, an article in some copies on Sunday about the Mets’ 10-8 extra-innings loss to the Cardinals misstated the surname of the Mets’ starting pitcher in the game. He is Brandon Knight, not Wright.
